name: React
description: ⚛️ I like how React makes it easy to build websites that change and respond without reloading the page. Components help keep everything organized.

name: Java
description: ☕ Java is solid and dependable. I enjoy using it to build backend systems that need to handle a lot of users or data without breaking.

name: Spring Boot
description: 🌿 I like using Spring Boot because it helps me build backend services quickly and keeps everything organized. It works great with Java.

name: Python
description: 🐍 Python is easy to read and write, which makes it great for trying out ideas quickly. I use it when I want to focus on logic instead of syntax.

name: JavaScript
description: 🟨 JavaScript brings websites to life. I like how I can use it to make things move, change, or respond when people interact with a page.

name: NodeJS
description: 🌱 I like how NodeJS lets me build the backend of an app using JavaScript. It’s fast and simple, and I can use the same language on both ends.

name: HTML
description: 📄 HTML is the backbone of any webpage. I like how simple it is to structure content and get something visual up and running fast.

name: C/C++
description: 💻 C and C++ give me more control over what the computer is doing. I enjoy using them when I want things to be fast and efficient.
